title: Reverend Al Sharpton, "Rise Up: Confronting a Country at the Crossroads"
description:
Rev. Al Sharpton, the founder and President of the National Action Network, offers his thoughts on how activism can move America forward. He’s interviewed by Washington Post columnist Jonathan Capehart.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
